channel.title: Research Projects on Fahad Mehfooz
channel.description: Recent content in Research Projects on Fahad Mehfooz

item.title: To Predict Whether Or Not A Patient Has Diabetes.
item.description: Objective: To predict whether or not a patient has diabetes, based on certain diagnostic measurements included in the dataset. Dealt with class imbalance using SMOTE. Divided the data into train and test data. Performed oversampling on train dataset/ Trained on multiple models like Logistic Regression, SVM, Bernoulli Naive Bayes, Gaussian Naive Bayes, KNN, and XGBoost. Link to GitHub repository

item.title: EDA and Predictive Modelling On Rain In Australia
item.description: Dataset contains 145460 rows and 23 columns. Removing the outliers. Oversampling the train data to get more balanced data using SMOTE. Trained on multiple models like Logistic Regression, XGBoost, Bernoulli Naive Bayes, Gaussian Naive Bayes, and RandomForest. Link to GitHub repository

item.title: Cat Image Classifier Using Transfer-Learning
item.description: Classifying different images of cats into the following categories : Bombay, Calico, Burmese, Himalayan, Munchkin, Ragdoll, Siberian, British Shorthair, Russian Blue, and Dilute Calico. Trained the model on 11740 images. Dealt with class imbalance. Transfer learning is applied to train the model. Augmenting the data using an image data generator. Pretrained Model used: InceptionV3 Link to GitHub repository
